did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: On April 8, 1922, Martin J. Donahue opened a clothing and shoe store called Donahue's in L. R. Denegar's former location in the Beach block on West St. In March, 1936, he became postmaster of Litchfield. He died in 1946.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: On April 8, 1922, Martin J. Donahue opened a clothing and shoe store called Donahue's in L. R. Denegar's former location in the Beach block on West St. In March, 1936, he became postmaster of Litchfield. He died in 1946.
The records consist of customer account cards, 1922-1937.

arrangement.head: Arrangement of Materials
arrangement.p: The records are, for the most part, in alphabetical order.
